0: A RESOLUTION URGING THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES TO ENSURE A DRUG-FREE WORKPLACE BY REQUIRING ALL MEMBERS THEREOF, LEGISLATIVE STAFF, CONSULTANTS, OFFICERS, EMPLOYEES AND WORKERS TO SUBMIT TO A MANDATORY DRUG TEST
